original_text: The Lord had allowed those nations to remain; he did not drive them out at once by giving them into the hands of Joshua.
korean_text: 여호와께서 그 이방 민족들을 머물러 두사 그들을 속히 쫓아내지 아니하셨으며 여호수아의 손에 넘겨 주지 아니하셨더라

sentences.original_text: The Lord had allowed those nations to remain
he did not drive them out at once
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그들을 한 번에 쫓아내지 않으셨다

sentences.original_text: by giving them into the hands of Joshua
